page.title: 08MY HOBBIES ARE FOOTBALL...
page.content: I live in a village called{Pennard. It has a few interesting aspects such as a golf course, a beach and quite a few clubs. I go to{Bishopston {Comprehensive School.}It is a bit like Alcatraz (nobody has escaped from it yet!). My hobbies are football, break dancing, scouts and soon I am hoping to take up surfing. Football is my main hobby and I play for an amazing team called{Pennard Colts}(we have only won 3 games this season). Break dancing is a kind of acrobatic dancing with moves with very unusual names such as Boston-caterpillar, Swallow- dive and Moon-walk. Surfing is a very difficult sport to do because you have to stand on a foam and fibre-glass board on a wave. RICHARD BRYANT 2S
